name: Flynn Rider
flavor_text: "I love a good fan club, but they could at least try to get the nose right!"
text:
Shift 2 (You may 2 "ink" to play this on top of one of your characters named Flynn Rider.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
One Last, Big Score: This character gets -1 {l} for each card in your opponents' hands.
